data.comment: The big names in today's match at Craven Cottage have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Fulham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
Darren England signals a Southampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton at Craven Cottage.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 7, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London Fulham drive forward through Ademola Lookman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 10, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In London Fulham's Ivan Cavaleiro is caught offside.
In the minute 12, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Darren England signals a Southampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Darren England signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Southampton's area.
Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Fulham.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In the minute 25, Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Fulham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 27, Southampton drive into the zone and James Ward-Prowse is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Free kick Fulham.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Fulham needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
In the minute 32, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in Fulham.
Darren England awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton.
At Craven Cottage, Bobby Reid has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
In the minute 41, Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Darren England signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Darren England signals a Fulham throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 44, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Southampton.
Darren England blows against Southampton's Shane Long for offside.
In the minute 45, Fulham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Darren England awards Southampton a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Craven Cottage.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Free kick Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Southampton.
Darren England awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Southampton at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham push forward at Craven Cottage and Antonee Robinson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Southampton defence.
Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Southampton to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 63, Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters is whistled for offside at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
In the minute 65, Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Free kick for Southampton in the half of Fulham.
Free kick in a good position for Fulham!
In the minute 67, Fulham's Harrison Reed is on target but unsuccessful.
Darren England signals a Southampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
Southampton pushes forward through Shane Long, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Fulham.
In London, Ademola Lookman of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 72, Darren England signals a free kick to Fulham.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Southampton needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Southampton.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Southampton drive forward but Shane Long is judged offside.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa is booked for the home team.
Darren England signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Southampton's area.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
In the minute 78, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Southampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Matt Wells is making the team's first substitution at Craven Cottage with Aleksandar Mitrovic replacing Bobby Reid.
In the minute 84, In London, Jack Stephens (Southampton) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Darren England signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 86, Che Adams for the away team is judged to be offside.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 89, Darren England signals a Southampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Free kick Fulham.
At Craven Cottage the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Aleksandar Mitrovic for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Darren England awards Southampton a goal kick.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Ola Aina (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Darren England blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Neeskens Kebano is on a sub for Ademola Lookman for Fulham.
Southampton make their first substitution with Daniel N`Lundulu replacing Shane Long.
Moussa Djenepo is replacing Stuart Armstrong for Southampton at Craven Cottage.
